title: Case-Based Learning Course for Resolving Elementary Classroom Management Dilemmas

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of foundational curriculum, familiarity with mathematics content, and understanding of basic classroom management principles
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating preservice teachers' ability to resolve complex classroom management issues in elementary settings through case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can analyze case studies of management dilemmas in real elementary classrooms to derive core problem factors.
Through case-based discussions, learners can propose multidimensional solutions to classroom management issues
Learners can develop concrete implementation strategies for classroom management problems that may arise in mathematics instruction

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
